nodes.text: Puffy was a male porg that lived on the Millennium Falcon after the Battle of Crait. Puffy was named by the Weequay pirate, Hondo Ohnaka after his fondness of blue puff cubes. Hondo used the snacks to train the porg into releasing the pirate from a cell. Puffy's actions in turn trained a flock of porgs to help in the daring escape.
Puffy first appeared in the canon junior novel Pirate's Price, which was written by Lou Anders and published in 2019.
